page.title: 04Medstead Information Centre
page.content: We have a very good security system which is needed for all the computers we have. There is also a library attached to the information centre. It has very advanced peripherals for the main BBC computer including teletext, a modem and a printer. All of the computers have disc drives. We also have a big monitor joined to a computer and people walking by can see easily without interrupting the children working. Because the information centre does not have have any windows we have skylights. The school is linked to other schools by means of the Times Network for schools. We were the first primary school to join this network, a database and mailing system for schools.
